SELECT tt.*, t1.NAME userName,t2.`name` projectName FROM ( SELECT t.id, t.project_id, t.oper_user, t.source_id, t.oper_type, t.oper_module, t.oper_title, t.oper_time, t.oper_content FROM operating_log t INNER JOIN operating_log_resource t3 ON t.id = t3.operating_log_id
t.oper_type IN ('UPDATE','BATCH_UPDATE') AND t.oper_content IS NOT NULL
AND t3.source_id = #{request.sourceId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND t.oper_content like '%diffValue%'
AND t.oper_content REGEXP 'preProcessorRaw|preStepProcessorRaw'
AND t.oper_content REGEXP 'postProcessorRaw|postStepProcessorRaw'
AND JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(t.oper_content, '$.columns[*].diffValue')) IS NOT NULL
)tt LEFT JOIN `user` t1 ON tt.oper_user = t1.id LEFT JOIN project t2 ON tt.project_id = t2.id ORDER BY tt.oper_time DESC

#{id}
